scripts.build: cd bitcoinjs-lib && git checkout opt-in-bitcoincash-sighash && npm install && cd .. && browserify bitcoinjs_browserify.js --standalone bccr > docs/bitcoin.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js docs/jquery.min.js && cp -r node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.css docs/bulma.css  && cp -r node_modules/bignumber.js/bignumber.min.js docs/bignumber.js
